Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

I'm having issues with quite a few of your games. They get stuck on a 'Loading...' screen.

I've tried it on a number of devices and none of them work.
I'd like to make a game using quest and host it here but I'm concerned if I can't try out and see how other games are working? I wonder if my game would suffer the same issue?

Thanks,

Rach227
